price: Onlar, artık mele-i a'la'ya (yüce topluluğa) kulak veremezler. Her taraftan taşlanırlar.
arabic: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ وَيُقۡذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٖ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yassammaʿūna ilā al-mala-i al-aʿlā wayuq'dhafūna min kulli jānibin
